description: Docker Metrics with influx and Telegraf

targets.query: SELECT (100 - mean("usage_idle")) FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND "cpu" =~ /cpu-total/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT (100 - mean("usage_idle")) FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND "cpu" =~ /cpu[0-9].*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "cpu" fill(null)

title: Global Monitoring
